text: John Stamos ’ s ‘ Full House ’ Son Had the Best Response to His Baby News Just yesterday, we learned that John Stamos is going to be a dad IRL. And now, his TV son is opening up about Uncle Jesse ’ s parenting potential. In a recent interview with E! News, Blake Tuomy - Wilhoit, who played Nicky Katsopolis on Full House, reacted to Stamos ’ s baby news and revealed he has high hopes for the soon - to - be dad. He said, “ I recently heard the news about John and Caitlin ’ s baby on the way. A huge congratulations! He is going to be a great father. I mean, look at me, I turned out great. ” Tuomy - Wilhoit appeared on the hit
